The Amulet of the Eye is an item that allows unlimited teleportation to the Temple of the Eye, just south of the portal. It is obtained by showing the tarnished locket to Phileas the Lumbridge Guide.

The amulet can be recoloured using abyssal dye (received from the Rewards Guardian) to a red, blue, or green colour scheme.

If players die with amulet of the eye, it will be lost. Players can reclaim the amulet from the Lumbridge Guide.

The '''Amulet of the Eye''' is an item that allows unlimited teleportation to the [[Temple of the Eye (location)|Temple of the Eye]], just south of the [[Portal (Temple of the Eye)|portal]]. It is obtained by showing the [[tarnished locket]] to [[Lumbridge Guide|Phileas the Lumbridge Guide]].

The amulet can be recoloured using abyssal dye (received from the [[Rewards Guardian]]) to a red, blue, or green colour scheme.

If players die with amulet of the eye, it will be lost. Players can reclaim the amulet from the Lumbridge Guide.
